title: Advanced Mathematics Problem-Solving Project Utilizing Information Processing-Based Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: High school mathematics fundamentals (functions, calculus, statistics) and basic understanding of programming languages (Python)
context.additional_context: Data analysis and mathematical modeling projects for real-life problem-solving, with experiential learning reinforced through team collaboration

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate the ability to systematically solve complex problems through mathematical modeling using real-world data.
Project teams complete the experiential learning cycle (experience-reflection-conceptualization-application) by progressing through information collection-processing-interpretation stages.
Learners self-assess and peer-assess mathematical thinking processes and problem-solving strategies through individual learning portfolios.

resources: Online data analysis tool (Google Colab, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
